content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":247552,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス、大変よ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lance, it's serious!\""},{"lineNumber":247553,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":247554,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あっ！　ご、ごめんね！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah! S-sorry!\""},{"lineNumber":247555,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その、そういうタイミングとは知らなくて！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I didn't know it was such a timing!\""},{"lineNumber":247556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええい、そういうのはいい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Enough of that.\""},{"lineNumber":247557,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それより、何があった？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"More importantly, what happened?\""},{"lineNumber":247558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、そうなの！　大変よ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, yes! It's serious!\""},{"lineNumber":247559,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……魔人ワーグが現れたわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...The demon Warg has appeared.\""},{"lineNumber":247560,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだと！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What!?!\""},{"lineNumber":247561,"originalJapaneseLine":"「妙に静かすぎると思って、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought it was strangely quiet,"},{"lineNumber":247562,"originalJapaneseLine":"　辺りを回ってみたら、","translatedEnglishLine":"so I went around looking,"},{"lineNumber":247563,"originalJapaneseLine":"　村人が道ばたで沢山眠っていて……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and many villagers were sleeping by the roadside...\""},{"lineNumber":247564,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは……確かにワーグの仕業だな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That definitely sounds like Warg’s doing...\""},{"lineNumber":247565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私も……少し香りに当てられたみたいで……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was... affected a little by the scent too...\""},{"lineNumber":247566,"originalJapaneseLine":"　くっ、太ももつねりながら戻ってきたけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Gritting my teeth, I pinched my thigh while coming back...\""},{"lineNumber":247567,"originalJapaneseLine":"「確かに魔人ワーグの催眠能力は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Indeed, demon Warg’s hypnotic ability is...\""},{"lineNumber":247568,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すごいみたいね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"amazing... it seems.\""},{"lineNumber":247569,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どこだ！　どこにいる！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Where is it!? Where is it located!?\""},{"lineNumber":247570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「姿は確認できてませんが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We haven't confirmed its figure,"},{"lineNumber":247571,"originalJapaneseLine":"　寝ている村人達を確認したところ、","translatedEnglishLine":"but looking at the sleeping villagers,"},{"lineNumber":247572,"originalJapaneseLine":"　村の西にいるみたいです」","translatedEnglishLine":"it seems to be on the west side of the village.\""},{"lineNumber":247573,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうか、なら」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I see, then\""},{"lineNumber":247574,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラは一度溜め息をついてから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera sighed once,"},{"lineNumber":247575,"originalJapaneseLine":"表情を引き締めて顔を上げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"tightened her expression, and looked up."},{"lineNumber":247576,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここまで来たんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We've come this far."},{"lineNumber":247577,"originalJapaneseLine":"　決着をつけてやる」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll settle this.\""},{"lineNumber":247578,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、でも……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-But...\""},{"lineNumber":247579,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大丈夫でしょうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is it going to be alright?\""},{"lineNumber":247580,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一度眠っちゃったら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Once you fall asleep,"},{"lineNumber":247581,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう終わりなんですよね……","translatedEnglishLine":"it’s over, right...?"},{"lineNumber":247582,"originalJapaneseLine":"　撤退した方がいいんじゃ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe we should retreat...\""},{"lineNumber":247583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうする、ランス？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What do you want to do, Lance?\""},{"lineNumber":247584,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんっ、決まってる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, it's decided.\""},{"lineNumber":247585,"originalJapaneseLine":"「帰るー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm going home!\""},{"lineNumber":247586,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、帰るのか！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, you’re going home!?\""},{"lineNumber":247587,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここまで来て！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"After coming all this way!?\""},{"lineNumber":247588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス、サテラはそんな臆病者を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lance, Satera never intended to make a coward like that"},{"lineNumber":247589,"originalJapaneseLine":"　使徒にしたつもりは――！」","translatedEnglishLine":"one of the apostles—!\""},{"lineNumber":247590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なーんの対策もしないまま","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Charging in without any sort of countermeasures"},{"lineNumber":247591,"originalJapaneseLine":"　突っ込むのは馬鹿のすることだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"is the act of a fool.\""},{"lineNumber":247592,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに今回はやばいと思っても、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Besides, even if we think it’s dangerous this time,"},{"lineNumber":247593,"originalJapaneseLine":"　逃げることも出来なくなりそうだからなぁ」","translatedEnglishLine":"we might not even be able to run away.\""},{"lineNumber":247594,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、それは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uh, th-that is...\""},{"lineNumber":247595,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んじゃ、撤退するぞー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, let's retreat!\""},{"lineNumber":247596,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は魔人ワーグと会うことなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others left and returned to Lance's castle without meeting demon Warg."},{"lineNumber":247597,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城へと帰っていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"They headed back to Lance Castle."},{"lineNumber":247598,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ワーグの所に行くぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We’re going to Warg’s place.\""},{"lineNumber":247599,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふん、とーぜんだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh, obviously.\""},{"lineNumber":247600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「が、シィルの言うように","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, like Seel said,"},{"lineNumber":247601,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんも準備なしってのもな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it’s not good to go in unprepared...\""},{"lineNumber":247602,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんかワーグに対しての対策はないのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn't there some kind of countermeasure against Warg?\""},{"lineNumber":247603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「フェロモンだからな……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It’s pheromones, after all...\""},{"lineNumber":247604,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出来るだけ呼吸しないようにするとか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Like trying not to breathe as much as possible...\""},{"lineNumber":247605,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、だがこれも気休めだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, but even that is just a comfort...\""},{"lineNumber":247606,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あとは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As for the rest...\""},{"lineNumber":247607,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あとは？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The rest?\""},{"lineNumber":247608,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、根性だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"G-gut!\""},{"lineNumber":247609,"originalJapaneseLine":"　根性さえあれば眠ったりなんてしない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you have enough guts, you won’t fall asleep!\""},{"lineNumber":247610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そーな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yeah, right.\""},{"lineNumber":247611,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、サテラを馬鹿にしてるのか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-are you mocking Satera!?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その、そういうタイミングとは知らなくて！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I didn't know it was such a timing!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村人が道ばたで沢山眠っていて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and many villagers were sleeping by the roadside..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……確かにワーグの仕業だな……」
「私も……少し香りに当てられたみたいで……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was... affected a little by the scent too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ、太ももつねりながら戻ってきたけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gritting my teeth, I pinched my thigh while coming back..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かに魔人ワーグの催眠能力は……

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Where is it!? Where is it located!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝ている村人達を確認したところ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but looking at the sleeping villagers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村の西にいるみたいです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seems to be on the west side of the village."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラは一度溜め息をついてから、
表情を引き締めて顔を上げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: tightened her expression, and looked up.
Is it going to be alright?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう終わりなんですよね……
撤退した方がいいんじゃ……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What do you want to do, Lance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス、サテラはそんな臆病者を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lance, Satera never intended to make a coward like that

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なーんの対策もしないまま
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Charging in without any sort of countermeasures

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 突っ込むのは馬鹿のすることだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is the act of a fool."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに今回はやばいと思っても、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Besides, even if we think it’s dangerous this time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げることも出来なくなりそうだからなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we might not even be able to run away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は魔人ワーグと会うことなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others left and returned to Lance's castle without meeting demon Warg.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城へと帰っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They headed back to Lance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんも準備なしってのもな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s not good to go in unprepared..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんかワーグに対しての対策はないのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't there some kind of countermeasure against Warg?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出来るだけ呼吸しないようにするとか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like trying not to breathe as much as possible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、だがこれも気休めだな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, but even that is just a comfort..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 根性さえあれば眠ったりなんてしない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you have enough guts, you won’t fall asleep!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、サテラを馬鹿にしてるのか！？」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
